# Data Structures
data types                | data structure 
--------------------------|-----------------
various                   |  tabular
numeric                   |  matrix
numeric + time            |  time series
jason/xml                 |  hierarchical
html                      |  text/ hierarchical
free text                 |  text
numeric + location        |  spatial
numeric + location + time |  spatio-temporal
graph                     |  tree / hierarchical
